explains: adj. 慈善的；仁慈的，宽容的；慷慨的
wordGroup: charitable foundation 慈善基金，慈善机构

sentences.en: He had set up two charitable trusts.
sentences.cn: 他已经成立了两家慈善信托机构。

sentences.en: We are happy to donate to bona fide charitable causes.
sentences.cn: 我们很乐意向真正的慈善事业捐赠。

sentences.en: They also donated space for 3.1 million pounds of charitable shipping globally.
sentences.cn: 他们还为全球310万英镑的慈善运输捐了场地。
